pair.title: Search for Squeezbox server
pair.title_desc: Homey will try to find your SqueezeBox servers (Logitech Media Servers) automatically
pair.title_manual: Manually enter details for Squeezbox server
pair.title_manual_desc: Enter your server addres (IP or hostname) and port to get currently known players on that server
pair.msg_invalidData: Server address and/or port field empty.
pair.msg_noDevices: Unable to save, no players haven been found. Please correct the settings and test again.
pair.msg_addedDevices: Successfully added __devices__ Squeezebox player(s) to Homey
pair.msg_errorAddingDevice: Error while adding new Squeebox player(s) to Homey: __errorMsg__
pair.msg_wasErrorWhileAdding: While adding one of the devices, an error occurred. Please check the devices list.

app.msg_playlistNotFoundOnServer: No playlist with name "__playlistName__" found on server "__serverName__"
app.msg_unableGetStatus: Unable to get the status of the device
